metadata.title: CVE-2014-4657 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The safe_eval function in Ansible before 1.5.4 does not properly restrictthe code subset, which allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary codevia crafted instructions.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-4657` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
ansible-fireball - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
ansible-node-fireball - 1.6.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ansible package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.6.5+dfsg-1').
